questionResults.question: Which are the most awarded dogs?
questionResults.sql:
SELECT d.name, COUNT(a.award_id) AS award_count
FROM dog d
JOIN award a ON d.dog_id = a.dog_id
GROUP BY d.dog_id
ORDER BY award_count DESC;
questionResults.friendlyResponse: The most awarded dogs are Buddy with 2 awards and Bella with 1 award! 🐾

questionResults.question: Which dogs have multiple owners?
questionResults.sql:
SELECT dog_id
FROM person_dog
GROUP BY dog_id
HAVING COUNT(person_id) > 1;
questionResults.friendlyResponse: The dogs with multiple owners are 4 and 5.

questionResults.question: Which people have multiple dogs?
questionResults.sql:
SELECT p.name
FROM person p
JOIN person_dog pd ON p.person_id = pd.person_id
GROUP BY p.person_id
HAVING COUNT(pd.dog_id) > 1;
questionResults.friendlyResponse: Laura Stevenson and Sydney Smith have multiple dogs!

questionResults.question: What are the top 3 cities represented?
questionResults.sql:
SELECT city, COUNT(*) as city_count
FROM zip
GROUP BY city
ORDER BY city_count DESC
LIMIT 3;
questionResults.friendlyResponse: The top 3 cities represented are Washington, Provo, and New York!

questionResults.question: What are the names and cities of the dogs who have awards?
questionResults.sql:
SELECT d.name AS dog_name, z.city
FROM dog d
JOIN award a ON d.dog_id = a.dog_id
JOIN person_dog pd ON d.dog_id = pd.dog_id
JOIN person p ON pd.person_id = p.person_id
JOIN address addr ON p.person_id = addr.person_id
JOIN zip z ON addr.zip = z.zip;
questionResults.friendlyResponse:
Sure! Here are the award-winning dogs:  
- Buddy from New York  
- Bella from Washington

questionResults.question: Who has more than one phone number?
questionResults.sql:
SELECT p.name
FROM person p
JOIN phone ph ON p.person_id = ph.person_id
GROUP BY p.person_id
HAVING COUNT(ph.phone_id) > 1;
questionResults.friendlyResponse: Charlie Brown has more than one phone number!

questionResults.question: Who doesn't have a way for us to text them?
questionResults.sql:
SELECT p.person_id, p.name 
FROM person p 
LEFT JOIN phone ph ON p.person_id = ph.person_id AND ph.can_recieve_sms = 1 
WHERE ph.phone_id IS NULL;
questionResults.friendlyResponse: It looks like Bob Jones, Jimmy Hendricks, Sydney Smith, and Jordan Malone don't have a way for us to text them.

questionResults.question: Will we have a problem texting any of the previous award winners?
questionResults.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT d.dog_id
FROM dog d
JOIN award a ON d.dog_id = a.dog_id
LEFT JOIN person_dog pd ON d.dog_id = pd.dog_id
LEFT JOIN phone p ON pd.person_id = p.person_id
WHERE p.can_recieve_sms = 0 OR p.person_id IS NULL;
questionResults.friendlyResponse: No, you shouldn't have any problems texting the previous award winners!
